name: Scranta [Jam version]
description:
Sorry for the lack of quality. The jam's deadline and my lack of productivity in the early weeks of the jam made quality control out of the picture. Expect quality updates after the jam build release.

This game contains pixelated blood and little base-level themes of violence. Apologies if this wasn't okay by my wonderful giftee, but the deadline came too close for me to overhaul it.

CONTROLS:
[A] & [D] - Movement
[S] - Shield
[Mouse and LMB] - Aiming and Shooting, respectively.
[Arrow keys] - Menu scrolling.
[Enter] - Menu confirm.
[Esc] - Close game

FEATURES:
- Two weapons, a default, and an upgrade found in a gift box.
- Two modes, normal, and expert.
- A boss fight with two (finished) phases.
- One moderately repetitive music track that I frankly wanted to spend more time on.
